channel.title: Damn irc wont work for me again :(
channel.description: Ok well if any of you are from codestream then you may have noticed I was pretty active lately in it. That was because before I could not connect, even though the proper ports were opened and everything and then I formatted my computer and all of a sudden it worked again. So now I downloaded zonealarm, and it seems to me that the second I downloaded it irc has stopped working again. I made sure it allowed access to irc, and it did. But it just wont connect to codestream or hardly any other server. I un-installed zonealarm and yet it still doesn't work. I did a hard-reset on my router, and it worked again. So then the next day it stopped working again, for some reason everytime I connect to the internet(thus getting a new IP) irc gets blocked again, otherwise I have to manually set up my router just so I can go on for a day. Zone alarm seems to have messed up my internet since there are a lot of other things I can;t connect even though I gave them access. So, how can I allow things have access through zone alarm, whenever they have already been granted access? Does anyone else have issues with zone alarm?

item.title: Damn irc wont work for me again :(
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

The weird thing is, when i do a hard-reset on my router then it works again. As soon as I restart my comp or internet then it stops working again. I love the irc, I hate that i can’t get in there.

Read full topic

@SomethingToHide wrote:

Sorry bro don’t know :-/

I use PC-Cillian and Sygate Personal Firewall and I have no problems with IRC.

I’m not going to forma my computer for the 3rd time these past months, and I like zone alarm, I just want to know how to give access to codestream irc.[br][size=1]Posted at: April 26, 2006, 03:47:15 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: Damn irc wont work for me again :(
item.dc:creator: @arraness14 arraness14
item.description:
@arraness14 wrote:

jme_009:

Ok well if any of you are from codestream then you may have noticed I was pretty active lately in it. That was because before I could not connect, even though the proper ports were opened and everything and then I formatted my computer and all of a sudden it worked again. So now I downloaded zonealarm, and it seems to me that the second I downloaded it irc has stopped working again. I made sure it allowed access to irc, and it did. But it just wont connect to codestream or hardly any other server. I un-installed zonealarm and yet it still doesn't work. I did a hard-reset on my router, and it worked again. So then the next day it stopped working again, for some reason everytime I connect to the internet(thus getting a new IP) irc gets blocked again, otherwise I have to manually set up my router just so I can go on for a day. Zone alarm seems to have messed up my internet since there are a lot of other things I can;t connect even though I gave them access. So, how can I allow things have access through zone alarm, whenever they have already been granted access? Does anyone else have issues with zone alarm?

format computer. dont get zone alarm...theres plenty more

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,26.0.html

Read full topic
